docs.summary: Contains functionality for filtering a site search.
description: `WixSearchFilters` are created by chaining a single filtering function such as `eq()` and `gt()`
then used to create an additional search filter or to filter a search.
The following describes a typical filter builder flow:
1. Create a `WixSearchFilter` by chaining a single `WixSearchFilterBuilder` filter function (such as `eq()` or `gt()`) to the filter builder.
+ Pass one or more `WixSearchFilters` as parameters to an `and`, `or`, or `not` `WixSearchFilterBuilder` function to create a new `WixSearchFilter`.
+ Pass one or more `WixSearchFilters` as parameters to an `and`, `or`, or `not` `WixSearchBuilder` function to refine a search.
